data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of berothids (Insecta, Neuroptera) from the Late Cretaceous Myanmar amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Qiang, Shi, Chaofan, Ren, Dong (2019): A new genus and species of berothids (Insecta, Neuroptera) from the Late Cretaceous Myanmar amber. ZooKeys 864: 99-109, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.864.35271, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.864.35271
